titleStmt.title: Sanskrit Manuscripts in the Bodleian Libraries
titleStmt.funder: The cataloguing of this item was made possible through a benefaction from the late John P. Clay, founder and benefactor of the Clay Sanskrit Library.

msDesc.head: A composite manuscript containing twelve manuscript works on vyākaraṇa, bound together upon their arrival in the Bodleian Library.

binding.p: Early 20th-century brown textile binding over pasteboard, with shelfmark and description tooled in gold on the spine. Cardboard cover box.

history.acquisition: Donated by Shum Shere, Chandra Mahārāja Chandra Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana in 1909.

recordHist.source: Description by Barbora Sojkova, based on observation of the manuscript and existing descriptions.

msContents.summary: A complete paper manuscript of the Rapratyāhāramaṇḍana, composed by Rāmacandra Pāṭhaka.

msItem.title: Rapratyāhāramaṇḍana
msItem.rubric: F. 3v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrīmad guroḥ pādapadmaṃ namāmi
msItem.incipit: F. 3v [f. 1v in original foliation]: saṃciṃtyavādi pravarajetāṃraṃ śrīpataṃ jaliṃ kurve vādivilāsārthaṃ prasāhāramaṃḍnaṃ 1
msItem.colophon: F. 12v [f. 10v in original foliation]: iti śrīmaptāṭhakamurārisunupāṭhaka laśmaḍhāgratapāṭhaka rāmacaṃdra viracitaṃ raprasāhāramaṁḍanam saṃpurṣam śubham astu || cha ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and mid-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: An incomplete paper manuscript of the Vibhaktyarthanirṇaya, composed by Śrīkṛṣṇa Mauni. Preceded an unidentified verse in a different hand on the fly leaf.

msItem.title: An unidentified Sanskrit verse
msItem.incipit: F. 14r [f. 1r in original foliation: saṃbhūṣpaṃ sadapatyavatyarakarā [...]

msItem.title: Vibhaktyarthanirṇaya
msItem.rubric: F. 14r [f. 1v in original foliation]: || śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 14r [f. 1v in original foliation]: kāru upavarṣañalaḍaṃ phalaḍaṁ tapasāṁ satāṃ

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Highlighted in red powder.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A complete paper manuscript of the Pāṇinīya Liṅgānuśāsana.

msItem.title: Liṅgānuśāsana
msItem.rubric: F. 49v [f. 1v in original foliation]: [..ī] gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 49v [f. 1v in original foliation]: liṅgam || strī || śakārāñāmātaduhirusvasṛyānatāndaraḥ ||
msItem.colophon: F. 53r [f. 5r in original foliation]: || iti liṅgānuśāsanasūtrāṇi || śrī || || ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margins, verso. Occassionally erroneous.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: Left margin of the manuscript is damaged, with loss of some akṣaras and foliation. Conserved.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, bottom-right margin, verso.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A complete paper manuscript of the Kavikalpadruma, composed by Vopadeva, followed by an unidentified verse from a muhūrta or dharmatext.

msItem.title: Kavikalpadruma
msItem.rubric: F. 55vr [f. 1v in original foliation]: kavikalpaṃ || oṃ namo bhūvaneṣvaryyai namaḥ
msItem.incipit: F. 55vr [f. 1v in original foliation]: śabdā karakaragrāma marthamaṃ ilaṃ ilaṃ || jānātmāna manādyaṃ tam ādityaṃ tam upāsma he || 1 ||
msItem.colophon: F. 78v [f. 24v in original foliation]: iti śrī vopadevaviraciteḥ kavikalpadrumon nāmadhātupāṭhaṅ || samāptam ||
msItem.note: In different hand, the colophon continues: "3076 405 ||"

msItem.title: An unidentified muhūrta or dharma verse.
msItem.incipit: F. 78r [f. 24r in original foliation] asyāmaruṇodayestānaṃkāryaṃ || taduktaṃsṭatisaṃgrahe || sūryagrahaṇatulyāhiśrutkrāmāghasyasaptamī || aruṇodayavelāyāṃsnānaṃtatramahāphalaṃ || 26 || bhaviṣyotara || māghemāsisitepakṣesapnamīkoṭibhārkarā kuryāt snānār gharghyadānābhyāmāyurārogyasaṃpada || 27 || iti idaṃcastā ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Daṇḍas and marginal notes in red ink.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, bottom-right margin, verso.
Marginal and interlinear note in red ink on ff. 55r-56v [ff. 1v-2r in original foliation].

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A complete paper manuscript of the Kavikalpadruma, composed by Vopadeva.

msItem.title: Kavikalpadruma
msItem.colophon: F. 100r [f. 21r in original foliation]: iti śrī vopadevaviracitā kavikalpdrumonāmadhātupāṭhaḥ samāptaḥ || cha || cha || śubhaḥ || cha || || cha || || saṃvat 1617 samae pauṣa vadī vaturthī śukre lekhiliṣita tam idaṃ śrīmadalarkapure lekhitaṃ śrī harisaṃkarena ātmapaṭhanārthaṃ paropakārārthaṃ || śrutam asta sarvajātaḥ || || cha || ||

note.p: F. 100r [f. 21r in original foliation]: [After the colophon proper, there is a note in a different hand reading:] dhyeyaḥ kalpadrumonāmadhātupāṭho yaṁ viṣṇudevasya

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, bottom-right margin, verso. Partially covered by the binding.
Additional Devanāgarī numerals in a different hand, top-left margin, verso. Partially covered by the binding.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: In good condition. Torn, but restored margins on a few leaves.

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Interlinear notes in red ink. Highlighted in red powder.

additions.p: Interlinear notes in red ink on ff. 81r-94r [ff. 2r-15v in original foliation].
Three inscriptions on the final flyleaf in three different hands: "heraṃba", "dhanaśyāmamiśreṇākrītam 3", and "kavikalpadrumapustakamadovighudevasya"

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A previously uncatalogued paper manuscript of Vyākaraṇa Kroḍapatrāṇi.

msItem.title: Vyākaraṇa Kroḍapatrāṇi
msItem.rubric: F. 102v [f.1v in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ
msItem.incipit: F. 102v [f.1v in original foliation]: pasmāt pratyayavidhis tad ādipratyayeṃ gamityaṃ gasaṃjñā vidhāyakesūve yasmāt pratyayavidhis
msItem.colophon: F. 112r [f.11r in original foliation]: iti śivam

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Highlighted in red powder.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

msItem.title: Dhātupāṭha
msItem.rubric: F. 114v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 114v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrī saṃkaṭāpadām mojaṃ nattvāsarvārthasiddhidam ||
msItem.colophon: F. 134r [f. 21r in original foliation]: || iti dhātupāṭhaḥ samāptaḥ || || cha || || || || patrasaṃkhyā || 21 || padyasaṃkhyāpaṃcāśat || 50 || || ||

msItem.title: Saṃkatāpada
msItem.rubric: F. 134v [f. 21v in original foliation]: śrī saṃkaṭe maheśāni vilokayakṛpābharaiḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 134v [f. 21v in original foliation]: pūrṇaiḥ kaṭakṣair mādīnaṃ hīnaṃ tvat kṛpayādhunā || 1 ||

msItem.title: Uṇādisūtra
msItem.rubric: F. 136r [f. 23r in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ || śrī saṃkaṭāpadapaṃ keruhābhyāṃ namaḥ || || śrī saṃkaṭāṃ praṇamyātha jagaduddhāriṇīṃ parāṃ ||
F. 136r [f. 23r in original foliation]: uṇādisūtrasaṁktrekha[.] kriyate mādhavenahi || 1 ||
msItem.colophon: F. 144r [f. 32r in original foliation]: pustakaṃ likhitaṃ caiva gopīnāthena dhīmatā || hitāyātmaparārthaṃ ca likhitaṃ ca subhāṣitam || 1 || || || saṃvat 1907 phālunaśuddha 13 mandelekhaḥ || || śrīmaddhaihayādhīśo ‘vatu || || ||

msItem.title: An unidentified fragment
msItem.incipit: F. 144v [f. 32v in original foliation]: agṛhaśnāddhasūciḥ gopīnāthanātīrthasūpāhiṃkanīyāda

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margins, verso. Erroneous on f. 141 [f. 28 in original sequence] which is foliated both as f. 28 and 29. Due to the mistake, following f. is 30.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Highlighted in red ink.

additions.p: The flyleaf [f. 114r, f. 1r in original foliation] reads: || || dhātupāṭhauṇādisūtrasyedam idaṃ pustakam || patrasaṃkhyā 32 || ||
Abbreviated marginal title, top-left and bottom-tight margin, verso.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A complete paper manuscript of the Pāṇinīya Gaṇapāṭha.

msItem.title: Gaṇapāṭha
msItem.rubric: F. 146v [f. 1r in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ kārtravīryārjunāya namaḥ
msItem.incipit: F. 146v [f. 1r in original foliation]: sarvaviśva | ubha | ubhaya | itara | itama | anya | anyatara | itara | tvat | tvanema
msItem.colophon: F. 166r [f. 21r in original foliation]: || śrī gaṇāpāṭhe gokr[ddh]anadīkṣitasūnu rāmakṛṣmaviracite 'v[y]amodhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ || || vārāṇośyā[?] likhitaṃ gaṇāpāṭhapustakam || rāmakṛṣmena vijñeyaṃ svayarārthaṃ hi yatnataḥ 1 || saṃvat 1832 mīticaitavaṭī 3 vārasomārakesamāpataḥ śrī ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margins, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Highlighted in red powder.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Rūpamālikā of Raṅgadeva, a simple list of nominal and verbal derivatives, following Siddhāntakaumudī, for beginners.

msItem.title: Rūpamālikā
msItem.rubric: F. 168r [f. 1r in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 168r [f. 1r in original foliation]: praṇābhyaśirasādevaṃ na siṃhaṃ varadaṃ guruṃ ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left, top-right, and bottom-right margins, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Highlighted in red powder.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top-left and top-right margin, verso.
Marginal notes and scribbles in black ink.
Spilled ink on ff. 169v-170r [ff. 2v-3r in original foliation].

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

msContents.summary: A composite paper manuscript containing a commentary of the Siddhāntakaumudī by Bhaṭṭojī Dīkṣita. and the Phiṭsūtra, written by Śāntanava, .

msItem.title: Siddhāntakaumudī
msItem.incipit: F. 190v [f. 1v in original foliation]: ataḥ paraṃ piṇa upitṭayajñiyāmaṁ trāprajāyaterāṃrṣa agnau juhoti |
msItem.colophon: F. 192v [f. 3v in original foliation]: oṃ vaṭakṛtau maṃtrabhāṣye dvitīyodhyāya @ 2 śrīkṛṣāya namaḥ śrīrāmacaṁdrāya namaḥ śrīkṛṣmaḥ śrīāmaḥ

msItem.title: Phiṭsūtra
msItem.colophon: F. 198r [f. 7r in original foliation]: iti śāṃtanācārya praṇīteṣu phiṭsūtreṣu tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: Incomplete. First folio missing in the second item.

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Highlighted in red powder.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top left margin, verso.

msContents.summary: A complete paper manuscript of the Samāsacakra, composed by Vararuci.

msItem.title: Samāsacakra
msItem.rubric: F. 200r [f. 1r in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 200r [f. 1r in original foliation]: atha prayogavidhiḥ || prayoga strividhaḥ || karttari prayogaḥ || karmāṇi prayogaḥ ||
msItem.colophon: F. 203v [f. 4v in original foliation]: iti samā[sa]cakram saṃvat 1848 mādha[br]udi 1

msItem.title: Rapratyāhāramaṇḍana
msItem.rubric: F. 205v [f. 1v in original foliation]: || śrī kṛṣmāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 205v [f. 1v in original foliation]: || saṃciṃtyavādi pravaraṃ jatāraṃ śrīpataṃ jaliṃ ||

category.catDesc: General teaching on ethics and particular ethical topics
Narrative literature relating to the Jinas, early Jain teachers, and individual characters
